mapper.select: SELECT count(w.wid) FROM weibo w WHERE EXISTS( select 'x' FROM follow f WHERE f.follow = w.account_id AND f.account_id=#{accountId})

SELECT w.*, a.`name` "account.name", a.follow "account.follow", a.fans "account.fans", a.weibo "account.weibo", a.pic "account.pic" FROM weibo w INNER JOIN account a ON w.account_id=a.account_id WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 'x' FROM follow f WHERE f.follow=w.account_id AND f.account_id=#{accountId}) ORDER BY w.wid DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{size}
